ParameterFields.Name: Guarded Area Radius
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
The ReDead has a base radius of 650 and this value is added to that.
If this is set to 127, it defaults to 0 added radius.
Because the maximum value here is 126, this doesn't change the size of the area it guards very much.

ParameterFields.Name: Should Check Switch To Enable Spawn?
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
If this is checked, the Enable Spawn Switch must be set for the ReDead to spawn.
If the Enable Spawn Switch is invalid, then unlike most enemies, this ReDead will never appear instead of always appearing.
